deployerVersion.description:
Check this to deploy a full deployable Chiba package containing the newly designed web forms.
The generated packages are standard WAR files which may be deployed in any Chiba 1.5.x instance under the 'webapp' web application server directory.
S-IDE provides the necessary components to deploy these packages through the 'deployer' tab, including the data controller to access data through generated web forms.

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the directory where you want to store the generated Chiba WAR deployment file; default value is under the generation path.
configurationParameter.label: Folder output for Chiba WAR deployment file
